Once the game gets past him, in a safe direction of the group, he fires on the game. (this technic is employed quite often BTW)
 
 We can sit here and come up with a thousand scenarios. None of which excuses the death of 6 people. He is quilty of killing six people. Five of them unarmed and a few shot in the back, in my source is correct. 
 
 Good thing he didn't pull that sh** in Texas. He'd be in the chair already.
Oh yeah, when we leave the camp, we ALWAYS have our rifles. But that is just my experience. What we do is very different style of hunting.
